Key Match Events: Harry Wilson added an improvised second goal from about 25 yards less than two minutes later
Driton Camaj scored Montenegro's goal in the 73rd minute
Pre-Game Insights: Conditions were extremely difficult, with heavy rain and a poor pitch
The match was moved from Podgorica to Niksic due to concerns over the pitch
Matija Sarkic, Montenegro's former goalkeeper, died in June and the team paid tribute to him
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy expressed satisfaction with the team's performance despite challenging conditions
Bellamy revealed that the game could have been called off due to the weather
The manager hopes to see his players again soon before their next match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales supporters used tricolour bucket hats to shelter from the rain
Ben Davies made a magnificent goalline clearance
Stevan Jovetic hit the crossbar with an effort from inside his own half
